summary:
Brussels: ☁️ Avg 12.4°C (0°C range), 22% rain (45% range)
High 14°C / Low 11°C
⚠️ Forecast uncertain
gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Meteoblue seems to contradict the baseline, but YR.no and Météo Belgique data couldn't be extracted. Meteoblue's temperatures aren't stated, but it indicates no rain, diverging from the baseline's 22% chance of precipitation. Given the uncertainty, perhaps it's best to carry an umbrella in case the baseline is closer to the mark - you wouldn't want to be caught in the rain like a wet monkey.
